title: Presentational Drawing Class
content:
You know the guy who performs presentation drawings for UPS?  
He's really good, or at least in synch with his CG guys.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804070356im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Presdarawing_6674.jpeg)
  
On the other hand, does anyone know, is there such a thing anywhere as Presentational Drawing Class 101?

Cheers!
author: Rob O. Font

comments.content: David, I hope you have a high res version of that. I want to make it into a poster so I can study and admire it. Who needs classes with examples like this? Go and do likewise.

\>David, I hope you have a high res version of that.

I don't unfortunately. Mr. Ballmer doesn't want _anyone_ copying his style. ;)

Cheers!
